top5.name: Fisch ğŸ„ [BOREAL PINES]
top5.description:
ğŸ¦ˆ Welcome to Fisch ğŸ¦ˆ

Dive into Fisch, the ultimate fishing adventure where exploration and progression are yours to control. Cast your line to catch rare and unique fish, each with 400,000+ possible variations. Explore a growing world with your trusty rod, and maybe even reel in some new friends along the way!

[How To Fish]
â€¢ Hold down to cast your bobber
â€¢ Await a bite. You can "shake" your rod to attract fish faster
â€¢ When you have a bite, hold down or click to pull the bar white bar. Follow the blue line to the best of your ability; it's okay to mess up a few times!
â€¢ When the progress bar on the bottom is full, you'll reel in your catch!

Credits:
*Creator: @WoozyNate
*Music (YT): @AZALI00013 & @0hkkei
*Music (X): @KapriiSun_
*& Special Thanks To All Testers

top5.name: [FNAF 6 UPDATE!] FNAF: Co-op
top5.description:
[MASSIVE UPDATES COMING SOON] 

[Player controlled animatronics are coming soon]
[FNAF 1 - 6 updates coming soon]

Welcome to FNAF: Co-op! 
Experience the fright of Scott Cawthon's 'Five Nights at Freddy's'... now with a friend. 
Survive together through the spine-chilling nights in the infamous haunted pizzeria. 
Will you outsmart Freddy's gang till dawn? 

Found a bug? 
Contact our group or developer. 

Stay tuned for content updates, gameplay improvements and bug fixes. 
Enter if you dare, brave night guards... 

Play the CLASSIC EDITION: https://www.roblox.com/games/12471458631/
Play the LEGACY EDITION: https://www.roblox.com/games/13508701859/

Tags: FNAF, Coop, Co-op, Cooperation, Co-operation, Horror, Five Nights At Freddy's, FNAF Roblox, Multiplayer, Survival
